name: Research Triangle Ventures
overview: Research Triangle Ventures is a venture capital firm specializing in seed and early stage companies. The firm typically invests in technology companies with a focus on software, electronics, and life sciences technology areas such as biotech, medical device, and medical services. It primarily invests in companies located in Southeast of United States with a focus on Research Triangle Park area of North Carolina. The firm can also invest outside the state of North Carolina in special circumstances. It seeks to invest initially between $250,000 and $500,000. The firm typically invests in proprietary products and services in large and growing markets in which the companyâ€™s sales can exceed $20 million in three to six years. It generally exits an investment through public offerings and acquisition. Research Triangle Ventures is based at Raleigh, North Carolina.
